name: Sphero Shader Pack
description:
This is a demo build of my Shader Pack Asset

This pack contains various shaders (and example materials) that I have created.

This demo scene shows how to use these shaders with a custom render pass to highlight something when obstructed.

All shaders work with URP by default.

List of shaders currently in pack:

Dither Shader, Highlight Shader, Scanline Shader, Toon Water/Lava Shader, TyedDye Shader

*Cat and bathtub included in asset

Thanks so much for checking out my shader pack! I hope you enjoy using them to create something beautiful! If you have any additional questions, comments, or would like to share any pics and/or videos of how you used either of these shaders, please contact me
